content.detailedDescription:
In june of approx. 1951-2, air force servicemen were standing in formation outside the barracks in the very early hours(dawn) when suddenly one of them said "hey, look at that"! they all looked towards the flight line and saw 3 cigar shaped ufos hovering over the selfridge afb flight line. after a few minutes jets were dispatched after the ufos, but by the time they were airborne the ufos were gone! nothing was ever said about it that i know of...Until my dad, who was one of the servicemen, told me.

are there any records of this incident?
content.summary: 3 cigar-shaped ufos hovered over selfridge afb flight line while the men were in morning formation

content.detailedDescription:
I had just returned home from seeing my granddaughters. when i park my car it is facing in a southerly direction. it was almost completely dark as i got out of my car. i closed the car door and looked into the northern sky as i usually do when i return home. 
i have always enjoyed scanning the sky and have had the opportunity to see numerous, "shooting stars." i also like to observe planes in my area and watch the different directions they eventually take. i am about ten miles due north of the "piedmont (greensboro) triad airport and about fifty miles northeast of the charlotte airport.
on this particular evening as i closed my car door and looked into the northern sky i saw what appeared to be a jetliner in the usual flightpath which i watch. i leaned back against the back of my suv and decided to watch this object to see where it may be headed. after approximately 7 to 10 minutes watching this object i realized, as it got closer, that i did not notice the usual blinking of any kind of lights. this was very strange and kept my eyes fixed on it. as it drew closer, i thought i was observing an airliner coming at me and on fire. i immediately got on my cellphone and called my brother-in-law to tell him i was watching what i really thought was a commercial airliner that was engulfed in fire. we stayed on the phone as i described to him what i was seeing. he asked if i thought it may be a meteorite and i told him absolutely not because of the time i was spending observing this. then it all of a sudden turned sharply toward the west. i kept watching it until it finally disappeared from my sight. neither of us could give a reason of what i had just observed. 
i watched the news closely that evening and also the next day. there was no mention of what i saw in any news sources. when this object got close enough to me i was actually frightened that i was watching a plane which was engulfed in flame and getting ready to crash right before my eyes. 

i am a retired, career firefighter from marlborough ma., and this is not the first time i have observed strange things in the sky. i had three incidents when i lived in marlborough and the first incident happened in 1965 and witnessed by my first wife and also my then, sister-in-law, returning home from dinner one evening. the next incident happened somewhere around 1975 on a cold january day after a snowstorm had hit the northeast. i was by myself and making an oil delivery into a 5,000 gallon tank. i was outside around 1:00 p.M. and the sky was 100% clear. the third incident happened i think around 1994 and my second wife was with me and we both observed something strange. the first incident happened around 9:30 p.M. and completely dark. the third incident happened at dusk.

this is the very first time i have actually shared these incidents in this way.

yours truly,
paul j. gauthier
content.summary: Ball of fire coming at me from the north. then changing direction to due west then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright, moving with moon.I was home 
neighbor called and said to look at the moon.Ufo.Very large object orbiting moon, several magnitudes brighter. interesting. cloud cover moved in and lost sight of moon and object.
content.summary: Object appeared to orbit moon

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, in-laws and myself were shopping at a bulk store on a saturday afternoon. the parking lot faces i-64 and the interchange at cross lanes, wv.  we came out of the store and were walking to our car. only me and my father-in-law saw the large object hovering over the roadway. it was blimp shaped but much larger and the surface was like liquid mercury. there were no lights, no windows, no markings, no noise whatsoever.  after a few seconds it moved westward at a rate of speed that i cannot explain, still no noise.  at work the next monday, a friend was telling about the same sighting, same day/time as us but 60 miles due west from where we were standing. i said "did you see that?" and only [name removed/cms], my father-in-law said that he did.  we talk about it occasionally but we believe we saw a ufo.
i have spoke with the witness that was 60 miles away, he describes the same object.
content.summary: We saw a large object (liquid mercury-like) hovering over i-64 highway when coming out of a store. it hovered, over the roadway then flew west at a speed that ive never seen, no noise ever.

content.detailedDescription:
1. went outside to let my dog out. noticed these bright lights.2 just the brightness attracted my eyesight
3. i thought they were christmas lights in my neighbors tree and then i could see they were in the sky and the lights stretched across the sky and not just in my neighbors tree
4. bright green lights. semi pulsing. remained stationary. 5. curiosity 6. i went outside arouns 610. stood outside for prpbably 15 minutes looking at them
 im inside and can still see them from my window. still 35 minutes after first witnessing them.
content.summary: Early morning viewing of bright green lights in the sky from e to south e sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1 a.M. i went to exit off the freeway get gas and take a bit of a rest p. i noticed shape cloud but didn't think much of it until i got out my truck then i looked and i notice it wasn't clouds, it had a structure shape squarish almost like a building floating in the sky with a definite blue haze aura or something with a dark blue color illumination below structure. i looked around for others who may have pulled over to view it, but cars kept driving not seeing it. i spotted it coming off exit but didn't think it was anything but low clouds until i got out to rest, then i noticed edges. stood there trying to see it better for couple minuted then edges seem to buzz, crackle electric effects for couple seconds. then i was able to see how large or was. like a single story office bldg, no lights but definite blue area aura below it. very dark area,in sky due to clouds. object was beneath cloud cover and about 500ft+ off ground from mountain side. i'd say solid 15min hovering, rotation, tilting then it slowly moved upward away path on side of mountain into cloud cover high up. very large. like bigger than luxor bldg but sqaured off areas. metal grey surface has grooves curving patterns on side. could not see topside. pattern of line grooves like fish hook pattern or semi swirl patterns. didn't look like a ship, more like a bldg floating. could have had better view if there was noon light. there look like a possible object behind next to it, i noticed when it started to ascend i saw a second blue aura further back, like miles behind it but too far to see object. i felt curious like trying to solve a puzzle feeling, body feeling was shivers from cold weather. cars kept driving by the whole time. i had a good fix on it with my eyes so i know it was not cloud shapes that low. no sounds expect a buzzing crackling electric noise for couple seconds and a humm. it rotated slowly. what made it interesting was the tilting as if it was trying to focus or position itself like a satellite dish allignment. but aiming it toward the mountain side, not the sky. blue aura stayed constant throughout sighting. ascending path was nw low angle upward into cloud cover. blue aura diminish once it took flight. structure was squared with many squares on top and bottom. sides were large and had swirl grooves or decrotive patterns. i say decrotive as it seem to be artistic instead of mechanical. again, very large bldg like floating. got back into truck thinking my phone camera would have been nice to take a shot but probably too dark. my head feels like i need caffeine all the time up til now. i had only one other encounter when i was living in honolulu. i saw smaller structure but same metal look and shape falling vertically that almost hit hotel front of aka wai. i was sitting on tailgate of my truck bed in harbor lot. that was 8yrs, who.
content.summary: Got off ann rd 215hwy to get gas, saw very large square object floating near mtn rotating & tilting, no lights but below it dark blue aura. object edges buzzed 2sec. electric flashes on edge outline. looked like a bldg floating very hi up near mtn. cloudy

content.detailedDescription: Around midnight to one in the morning as i was out for a walk i noticed that there were lights moving across the sky that were not blinking like the airplanes i had been seeing that night. i could make out a shape due to the position of the lights underneath the object and how stars behind the object were blocked out. i at first thought it was obviously a commercial aircraft as there were many flying around even as i viewed the object but the shape and non blinking nature of the lights strayed me from that conclusion. the object moved slowly across the sky with no visible changes in direction until it simply vanished against the black sky. i was awe struck in trying to figure out what the object was. i frantically looked back between the object and the commercial aircraft flying at the same time. this object seemed a lot closer than the commercial aircraft so i removed the earbuds i was using to listen to music  to see if i could hear anything from the aircraft but there was no sound despite it seeming so close. after the object had vanished i looked to see if i could still see the object in other parts of the sky but to no avail.
content.summary: Boomerang with lights underneath seen against night sky

content.detailedDescription: Saw a small object up in the sky. this is my photos and short video of my event experience.
content.summary: Night time over los angeles

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in the summer of 71or 72.I was 11 or 12 at the time.We left glidden around 2 or 3 am going out to lake augustin.We seen a fireball about 50 yards in front of us it came towards us at a high rate of speed. we were all scared but it went over the car, and then it was gone.The second time we seen it was the next year .Again it was summer around the same time at night.We first seen the light in the trees as we got closer to it it got so bright it was hard to see.As we got closer to it a logging company made a path in the woods so the trees were gone and at that time we could see the ufo and the bright light on the bottom of the ufo.Every one in the car started screaming.I was sitting behind the driver telling her to turn the lights off and stop.At this time the people in the car started yelling at the driver to go.What i seen that night at this time is....A ufo at the back of a house with a very bright white light on the bottom the light was about 15 feet wide and the ufo was about 30 feet wide it looked like a gray metal.I didn't see anyone or anything.At some point the light dimmed and the ufo flew towards glidden and the straight up.The people in the car finally stop yelling. i was asking the driver why she didn't stop.......She told me it was dark out and she didn't want to get her car hit by another car....It was so bright at the time it was as bright as day.Another lady in the car said you will see things like that at night.Nobody wanted to talk about what happened. the next day one of the adults told me never talk about what happened to anyone.Well a few years later in the summer we were up at the lake and i was talking to someone that had a cottage on the other end of the lake and she asked me what was going on over by me the night before. i asked her what was she was talking about.She told me someone at her place went outside late at night and he seen a very bright light in the area i was staying at.All i remember from the night before is i went to sleep around 10 pm so i could go fishing the next morning. 
as the years went by i was in my late twenties and i talked to my sister about what we seen she didn't have any memory of it.She told me she wished she did.
im 55 now the 2 adults in the car have died 2 of the kids i lost contact with, and my sister doesn't remember anything.
content.summary: First time we seen it we had a dark red fireball go over the car we were in.The second time it was hovering roof top level in back of a house.

content.detailedDescription: Dont know what this could be its not the sun i just noticed the bright light and took picture and just want share with to see if anything is in the clouds something huge.I believe to see?
content.summary: Strange bright light pictured then notice outlines of large object in clouds very large

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work and got off the number 5 bus at the stop across from the safeway. i was waiting for the light to change when something caught my eye in the sky as it was reflecting light off what i assumed was the wing as it turned. as it is a high traffic area for both small and large aircrafts i didnt focus to much on it while i walked to the sunnyside train station. i walked to the station and noticed that the object was infact not a plane or helicopter (i am an avid aircraft watcher) when i first saw it, it was just hovering and it stayed like that for about 10 or so minutes tell a helicopter flew close to it. the helicopter seemed to disturb the craft as it darted upward and moved away from the helicopter(nw direction after upwards). after the helicopter got close (i am unsure of what kind of helicopter it was) and the craft moved away the helicopter than did a 180 and went back the way it came. once the helicopter was gone the craft went back to its orignal spot. it once again hovered there for about 5 minutes. once again the same helicopter came back and this time the craft took off south. i watched it tell it disapeared behind buildings. all of this happened in like a 20 minute span or so. i seemed to be the person interested in it as i was not alone at the train station but no one was paying attention to the sky. the craft also made no noice. when the helicopter was in the same place as the craft you could hear it clearly
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw ufo hovering over river area

content.detailedDescription: I work the overnight shift in a group home in montgomery ny. for the last few weeks there has been a bright light in the sky. the light flashes green, red and white lights. i want to believe that it is a planet or a star, but it moves its position in the sky from diagonally across the street, to directly across the street, above the house across the street. i have taped this light on my iphone and ipad and i also have pics of it. a few weeks ago on either 11/2 or 11/9( it was definitely on a monday) i went out to have my last cigarette for the night. i stepped out onto the porch and saw this thing come flying across the sky. whe i was looking at it, i remembered, my mouth dropped and i kept saying to myself, what the hell is this? what the hell is this? but, i say this thing because i really don't remember what it was that i saw.  i was on the porch and there is a small parking lot in front of the house, then street. i don't know how to estimate how far away it was, but this is a residential neighborhood and it was right in front of me! it was flying at the altitude of the top of the trees, i think. all i know is that it hit a point in the sky and it exploded. the sky lit up and blue and white sparks flew down from it. if it was actually lower than the tree top( even though this incident is recent, since i experienced it, i have been having a hard time recalling the specifics. i am actually working with a hypnotherapist to recall what the object was)there are power lines there, but the power in the area was not disrupted. when it exploded, i ducked thinking debris was going to fly towards me, then i ran into the house. i was so afraid that i ran in with a lit ciggsrette and that is a no no! i asked my coworker if she saw a bright flash of light from outside but she didn't. i had to go back out and quickly put out my ciggarette and i hurried back inside. i peeked out the door to see where the object either exploded or went into another dimension but everything seemed normal. the energy in this area is very weird. when i'm outside smoking, i always feel like i'm being watched from above and a few years ago, i captured some very weird images in this area.(i attachd a pic of something weird. maybe mufon can have it analyzed)  true story and i'm not crazy.
content.summary: Something fly past the porch that i was standing on and exploded right in front of me

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on 183 in austin tx between 2200 and 2230 hrs, as i passed mlk and approached loyola i noticed a grouping of lights off the west side of the highway over little walnut creek park. thought it may have been a couple choppers at first cause planes coming in to land are always on the east side of the highway in that area. as i got closer to loyola i noticed more lights like more of the object being exposed as my point of view changed. 

the object was stationary, emitted no noise from what i could tell, i was driving, and it just sort of hung out over the park. looked to be twice the size of a jet liner if it was a singular object and was t shaped with what looked like a row of 4 to 6 windows on the side facing me, really big windows, bright orange and yellow-white lights at the point, undercarriage and along the cross bar at the rear. it was t shaped as in capital t not lower case t, the bottom of the t was facing south and the cross bar north.

fairly certain quite a few other drivers saw it as well because traffic seemed to slow down in that area even though the highway was not crowded and there were no accidents. saw a couple cars even slow down and pull off the road, so keep your eyes out, may be some video popping up soon.
content.summary: Was on n bound 183. t shaped lights w of hwy planes to land always on e side twice the size of a jet liner anyway

content.detailedDescription: As described above, no shape except 3 bright lights perfect triangle very large, pretty high, as it rotated and far right light disappeared the last two lights disappeared within 30 seconds as it continued to move east slowly silently.
content.summary: In back yard.Saw three very bright white lights equidistant pattern very large yet high up, pulled my wife outside continued to move very slowly east, but appeared to slowly change its plane to ground as far right light dimmed slowly,then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I'm a volunteer lighthouse keeper at big sable point lighthouse in ludington state park. on the evening of november 3rd 2015 i had taken some recycling cardboard to the car and was returning to the lighthouse. the sun had recently set but the lighthouse wasn't yet cloaked in darkness. i thought it looked wonderful and had lifted my phone camera to take a picture of it. i was facing west towards lake michigans shore. as i held my hands up to get a steady shot, i saw a dark object fall down the south side of the lighthouse tower. it crossed the roof of the keepers quarters between two dormers and fell to within a few feet of the gravel road/parking lot to the south of the lighthouse. the object then flew directly at me in an eastward direction dipping up and down very quickly. the movement drew my attention but i luckily continued my photo and pushed the button to snap the shot. just after the photo snapped it flew past the right side of my face so close i felt a slight breeze and heard a whoosh'. i didn't have time to turn my head but because of of my position i believe it flew directly over a sand burm and flew off east across the dunes toward hamlin lake. i had no idea what i'd seen until i dropped my hands and saw the image i had captured on my phone camera. because i read and research strange phenomenon i knew immediately what i'd witnessed. i believe i observed a 'flying rod' also known as a skyfish. it was dark colored in the distance but showed up as golden in my picture. i had the distinct feeling it had flown in off lake michigan, circled the tower light, and dropped down towards me flying in a west to east direction. by this time of year there aren't any insects larger than a fly in the air and the sound it made was a whoosh.  no buzzing, no flapping but a whoosh. i've lived in michigan my entire life and have tended to the light every year for the last 10 years +/-. i'm well acquainted w the flora and fauna of the area and have never witnessed anything like it. i'd swear an affidavit to all the above and would take a lie detector test as well. i have the picture in my possession as i report this and will include it in this report.
content.summary: I was taking a picture of the lighthouse and saw it fall to the ground and fly towards and past me.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out my back porch and viewed this with another witness and thought it might be an asteroid or rock made of copper falling from the sky. about a month later my son and i were driving home from long beach ca and were just passing garlock road on hwy 14 and notice a flaming green ball with a fire trail coming in just like the two i had seen earlier that fall. it then stopped suddenly near the last chance canyon area off of garlock road and became a saucer craft glowing green on bottom. this was witnessed by my son who could watch it from the passenger seat of the truck and i did not see it morph as he had into a saucer type craft. he said it slowing hovered down over the mountain and then did not see it anymore. the previous year last chance canyon was declared off limits to local miners by senator cranston and diane feinstein. after moving to henderson nv in 2005 and in the fall of 2005 i walked outside about 1 am and witnessed the same green flaming ball of light looking like a falling star and then going behind a mountain. so i had three separate viewings of the same phenomenon. i have witnessed 138 ufo's since 1979 and most showed a glowing red on bottom type of color but only one glowed green that my son saw. but all three viewings showed a green fireball coming in at a slant.
content.summary: Two green balls of flaming round vehicles falling like a star

content.detailedDescription:
A triangle shaped object moved from west to east.  each dot (actually the dots looked like small triangles) that made up the triangle was orange in color and almost looked like a projection in the sky.

         ^
        ^ ^
       ^   ^
      ^     ^
     ^       ^


there was no back to it.  it traveled from the west side of my house to the east side of my house in about 3 seconds.  it's normal for me to see planes in the sky at all times of the day and night.  they travel much slower and are much smaller than what i saw.  i would like to reiterate that this looked like a projection from the ground and moved at incredible speed, but the color of the image remained solid in the sky and then immediately disappeared.
content.summary: A triangle shaped object orange in color moved from west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left work at 755 am. i was driving east on a hwy just past a small rural airport. airplanes are common sites. the sun was coming up and it was clear out. the highway runs straight east. the sun was coming up off to the right of highway.  off to the left of highway i caught an object in my line of vision. 

at first i thought it was a small plane coming in on final approach to the airport. i was driving approx 55mph. i realized i had a difficult time determining the shape of a plane. it appeared close at first, like less than a mile. which i work in planes and helicopters and less than a mile is close. like a small plane coming in. but not shaped like a plane. 

then it became very very bright. almost like direct reflection of light from the rising sun off of a mirror. i immediately thought a small plane couldnt do that. it was difficult determining size and shape but it was changing. almost like it was spinning and the light quality was changing. i also realized it was not moving. it was a spot in the sky. 

my only quick thought was that it was an airplane at high altitude a great distance away and reflecting the sun. but no way. it initially was very visible and about the size of a small plane coming in. and then like something was pulling it away from me, the light decreased down in size to a pinpoint and disappeared.  and was gone. this all took maybe 15 sec. 

i stared at the sky the rest of the way home. ive seen ufo's before. this was eerie.
content.summary: Bright light in sky i thought was sun reflection off of airplane that changed and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Well me and my friends all decided to go buxton,welty rocks,,the winking man...To just chill out and have a smoke well we pulled up near a large hill then all got out to climb up and look about anyway it was dark n we could see for miles it was great no wind but the view was great ,,all of a suden in the distance a few miles or so away i saw a light like a star shooting straight up 500 to 1000 feet or so then coming straight back down from were it started it did that two to three times and then went up stoped the light just blinked out gone then 30 seconds later a strong wind came straight to us like was mental this so me and all of us got to ingie my mate to drive up that way to see what it was he was realy not wanting to go but we went anyway we were driving for a bout 5 - 10 minutes trying find were it was then we come driving around a hill top with a telegraf pole on the top then we saw it. it was like a diamond white light just sitting their then i said open the door i got out the jeep and went over the road to get a better look i looked up and waved like come here ..All of a suden the light started to move towards us i creped back towards the jeep every one was shouting get in get in and the light split into two lights like a car it came straight forward it was like a car at the front but it was triangle shaped no noise no sound just floated over us like a balloon but was defo not one, i went over us i felt like i could touch it then it went round this hill top out of sight then it was gone it was well strange the time went fast the earie presence was around i remember sheep in a huddle next to a gate close to the road and we all spoke about it then but never said anything to any one only my mum this i swer happened i have had a hard time remembering the date time and where this happened but it did
content.summary: Black triangle with two lights on the front and two blue burners on the rear

content.detailedDescription: Today there were military helicopters in a fleet flying low.  soon afterwards, a military jet took off from eug airport.  the military aircraft are becoming more and more visible in this area.  i recognize the noise of these aircraft and go outside to see, and most likely i will have my camera, as i did here.  i tried to keep in mind that ufo's sometimes are in the area when these military aircraft show up.  as the loud jet ascended and headed east, i tracked the jet as well as i could, since my camcorder does not have an eyepiece to frame the shot, but rather has a flip out monitor, which is difficult to track moving objects far away zoomed in tight.  it was when i was looking back at the video file, that i did notice somethings dark moving fast what appears to be near the jet.  this is near the end when the camera is looking over the roof line. also, in the movement of the camera, i did notice perhaps the same unknown object before.
content.summary: Today there were military helicopters in a fleet flying low.  soon afterwards, a military jet took off from eug airport.  the military aircraft are becoming more and more visible in this area.  i recognize the noise of these aircraft and go outside to see

content.detailedDescription: My coworker and i were headed north on st rt 62 north out of hillsboro, ohio around 7pm. it was mid-december, 2008?...Gets dark real early...My friend was driving the box truck,  i was on passenger side. looked up and noticed out of the upper windshield a swarm of bright white lights, 15 to 25 or so, flying in a ragged horizontal line formation nw to se...  flying at a high rate of speed. we watched them go by for probably 15 to 20 seconds. some of them would bounce up to another craft, then fall back into a loose swarm "formation". they looked to have some altitude, 10 to 15k?, not sure. but they were moving fast, and definitely controlled by intelligence. we lost sight as they disappeared over the horizon, heading se...My buddy was a ufo skeptic, till that nite. i've always believed, tho this sighting reinforced my knowledge...Now i know...Very exciting.
content.summary: A swarm like '52 over washington dc, only higher and faster moving...

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work .South on henry
clay blvd. looked up and seen this trail 
of smoke i guess.  but it was different 
then what an airplane would look like .
so i took a couple pics.  it's obvious 
it's not an airplane . looks more like 
a missle or some ufo. it was going super 
fast.And left a weird ring type trail .
i can't explain so well .But maybe the 
pictures will help .
content.summary: I was driving to work. traffic slowed down for some reason .And i looked up and seen whst looks like a missle or ufo?

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

in the summer of 1984, maybe august, at noon, while i was working at a service station in bullhead city, i saw a hugh silver saucer moving over mohave lake towards me. the customer i was waiting on saw it too. 
at first i noticed a small plane with a red stripe flying low, and then the saucer. they seemed to be on a collision course and they both avoided each other, i'm sure the pilot saw the craft. it was just following the river coming towards me. when it got near, the customer reached into his car to get his camera, and i waved at it. before the customer could take a picture the craft sped off in one second and was out of sight.
the service station was on mohave and highway 95.
i'd like to know if anyone else saw it.
i drew pictures and they are enclosed.
content.summary: In the summer of 1984, maybe august, at noon, while i was working at a service station in bullhead city, i saw a hugh silver saucer moving over mohave lake towards me

content.detailedDescription: Just back from manhattan - sitting in car outside of apartment-in bayside queens -suddenly bright object overhead - round very bright hovered for about ten minutes  moved up and down  -began to move away - we followed it for several miles to flushing meadows park suddenly just disappeared out of sight  ! left a lasting impression and belief in ufo" s.
content.summary: Sitting in car -bright light overhead ! moved away =followed it until it just disappeared from sight

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down rt 9 south when my passenger noted a light in the sky hovering. i noted that it matched the speed i was driving i could not get in front nor let it get behind me. i pulled onto bridge street and got out of the car and it was just hovering so at that time i walked closer to see if i could make out anything but my passenger got scared and called me back. a week later i was talking to a friend from cromwell who told me  she had a interaction with cromwell police because she was sitting on the side of the road watching a "ufo" above middletown i then realized it is the same one i was looking at on that saterday night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light floating then flying real fast

content.detailedDescription: I am not the primary witness. approximately 8:45 on monday december 11, my girlfriend was returning home from her nursing job. she was on rt 84 east bound in southbury. the event that follows took only approximately 30 seconds. directly in front of her, at quite a distance, appeared a very bright star like object, at which point she grabbed her phone, as she said it was brighter than anything in the sky. as she continued to make attempts at pics, the object approached in much clearer view, moving over her as she moved under, at which point her phone had stopped working. object was gone. as she continued on the highway toward home, she checked, and no picture existed. when she arrived home, they were there, on the phone.
content.summary: Girlfriend melinda. traveling on 84 east. first observed extremely over bright star like object. upon approach, a lit disc

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my place of employment off of drennan rd in colorad springs at app 4-430pm on 09oct2015.  i noticed an extraordinarily bright object that was stationary at the base of the mountains.  this was not a reflection from the sun as it was already positioned slightly behind the mountains.  

i did not see any actual movement during this time. other people who were at the stoplight with me were also filming the object.  

i have a video of the object, but i am unable to upload it with this report.  please contact me for any additional info.
content.summary: Extremely bright object that hovered stationary in the skies app 4 miles from norad

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends were on a campingg place not far from a river were we always chill. we do this ever year once in the summer. in the evening we go to the river make a camping fire and hang out together. we were all like 18 to 19 y/o. it was about midnight when we watched the sky to find starsymbols. when i directly watched at the opposide of the river, above the hills i noticed some of the stars were moving. i thought my eyes were mistaken me so i asked the others and they saw it it too. the longer we stared at the lights the more they moved. it were about 10 but i cant say exactly because some of them went on and of. they were moving right above us. they were pretty fast, faster as a plane or jet wouldve been. suddenly when the were bihind us they went even faster till they dissapeared in the horiozon. just a couple of seconds after that 3 planes flew the same track as the lights flew. they werent normal planes they flew way too low. it were like military jets or something like that. while i was watching them i was like paralyzed i didnt even think of moving but i was very scared. non of the others said a word or moved normally you would excpect 7 teenagers to instantly grab their smartphones and take pictures but we were like paralyzed. we didnt speak much about it and after the evening we never talked about it again.
content.summary: Flew in a changing foramtion. some lights went out and on

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed and felt a rumble and over a 3 second period heard a whoosh. i went and looked out my window facing north towards downtown and saw the craft heading north. there was a bright white light on the left side, a dim white light on the right and a red light in the center. the lights pulsates randomly and moved along a singular plane randomly. the craft hovered over down town in one place for 2 minutes and then slowly began moving towards the east and then i lost line of sight behind a tree.
content.summary: Craft flew over my house and hovered over downtown nashville

content.detailedDescription: i was just letting the dogs out to use the restroom, and noticed a start blue colored cloud hovering over a factory area. it had hovered for about a minute and had then begin moving from north to south. it had flown directly over me. i had seen that it was oval shaped when it had moved when crossing between me and the stars. at the bottom of the object the blue cloud that i had thouhgt i had saw looked more like a magnetic field. object was approximently 250-500 feet over me from the front of my house. this had happened on the 1st 2nd and the 4th time that i had seen the object. the second time i had gotten my son outside to see it,but this time it had started going north to south and then had went east from where we were standing. note more sittings had been seen since the writtings of this report. each sittings where at different times in the early morning hours.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: From a hover to  north to south .This happen 4 times over 3weeks. an was reported on the today show ( nbc ) by others ny and nj
